meanings.definition: A single-celled organism that lacks a cell nucleus and is considered one of the oldest forms of life on Earth.
meanings.sent1: The archaeon was studied under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are fascinated by the archaeon's unique structure.
meanings.sent3: The archaeon tried to find its way back to its tiny home.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of time, the archaeon stands as a resilient survivor.
meanings.sent5: The archaeon's simplicity belies its ancient complexity.
